Name: Zeus Cocktail
Ingredients: 5 ml De Kuyper Cr√®me de Cafe
30 ml Chilled water reduce if wet ice
Instructions: POUR fernet into chilled/frozen glass, swirl round to coat inside and DISCARD excess. MUDDLE raisins with cognac in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into fernet-rinsed glass.
Review: Rich, pungent and not too sweet.
History: Adapted from Dr Zeus, a cocktail created by Adam Ennis in 2001 at Isola in London, England.
